    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1748</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Omer: From Exodus to Revelation at Sinai (7-part Teacher Manual)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Omer: Von Exodus zu Enthüllung bei 
Sinai (Handbuch des Lehrer-7-part)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Omer : De l'exode à la révélation chez
Sinai (manuel de professeur 7-part)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Omer: Do exodus ao revelation em Sinai 
(manual do professor 7-part)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Omer: Dal exodus alla rivelazione a 
Sinai (manuale dell'insegnante 7-part)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Omer: Από την έξοδο στην αποκάλυψη sinai 
(εγχειρίδιο δασκάλων 7-μερών)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Omer: De éxodo a la revelación en 
Sinaí (manual del profesor 7-part)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Teacher's Manual which provides information on Laws and Customs, Sources, Activities, Educational Aims on the Omer, Second Pesach,Lag Ba'Omer and Shavuot</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Teacher's Manual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laws</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Customs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Educational Aims</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Omer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Second Pesach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lag Ba'Omer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Shavuot</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handbuch eines Lehrers, das Informationen auf 
Gesetzen und Gewohnheiten, Quellen, Aktivitäten, pädagogische Ziele 
auf dem Omer, zweites Pesach, Sträfling Ba'Omer und Shavuot zur 
Verfügung stellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le manuel d'un professeur qui fournit 
l'information sur des lois et des coutumes, sources, les activités, 
objectifs éducatifs sur l'Omer, le deuxième Pesach, retard Ba'Omer 
et Shavuot</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Manual de um professor que fornece a informação
em leis e os costumes, fontes, atividades, alvos educacionais no Omer,
segundo Pesach, retardação Ba'Omer e Shavuot</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manuale dell'insegnante che fornisce le 
informazioni sulle leggi e le abitudini, le sorgenti, le attività, 
obiettivi educativi sul Omer, secondo Pesach, il ritardo Ba'Omer e 
Shavuot</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εγχειρίδιο ενός δασκάλου που παρέχει τις 
πληροφορίες για τους νόμους και το τελωνείο, πηγές, 
δραστηριότητες, εκπαιδευτικοί στόχοι στον Omer, το δεύτερο 
Pesach, καθυστέρηση Ba'Omer και το Shavuot</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manual de un profesor que proporciona a la 
información en leyes y a los costumbres, fuentes, actividades, 
punterías educativas en el Omer, segundo Pesach, retraso Ba'Omer y 
Shavuot</string>
          </description>
